member.name: T:Castle.Components.Winforms.AssemblyResolver.AssemblyResolverComponent
member.summary: This component installs an Assembly Resolver delegate that asks the user for the location of the missing assembly. Once provided it caches the location.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
